response.original_title: Animated hero classics- Alexander Graham Bell
response.overview: "You have a gem of a great idea, if you can perfect it," Joseph Henry of the Smithsonian Institute tells Alexander Graham Bell when he presents his theory for the invention of the telephone. When Thomas Watson and Bell begin their work for a multiple telegraph, Bell becomes convinced that he can send the complex sounds of human speech over a wire from its vibrations.
response.title: Animated hero classics- Alexander Graham Bell
